nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: add

nodes.documentation: @dev total number of tokens in existence

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "ERC20: burn from the zero address"

arguments.value: ERC20: burn from the zero address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ERC20: burn from the zero address"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Destroys `amount` tokens from `account`, reducing the
total supply.
     * Emits a {Transfer} event with `to` set to the zero address.
     * Requirements:
     * - `account` cannot be the zero address.
- `account` must have at least `amount` tokens.
nodes.name: burn

nodes.documentation:
@dev Function to stop minting new tokens.
@return True if the operation was successful.
nodes.name: finishMinting

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner can do this"

arguments.value: Only the owner can do this

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner can do this"
